name: Courtney Grimes
text: For my daughters sweet 16 we spent a few days in Gulf Shores. The only thing she really wanted to make sure she got to do was go in this store. We spent maybe 2.5 hours searchig for our treasures and we just had an amazing experience.  When we walked in the store you could feel the energy. The owner was so kind. He recommended a few items to us . Selenite and black tourmaline. I really appreciated that he took his time to talk to us and educate us. I hope to visit again before the shop goes to online.

name: Kinsley Keeton
text: I went here while I was staying in the area on vacation and was looking for a tigers eye bracelet. I easily found just what I was looking for and even bought another crystal. It had almost every crystal I was interested in I will definitely be visiting again next time I'm in town!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and your support! Be sure to subscribe to our email for the new location announcement. Our last day in our current location will be Aug 29th. 🙏💜 we will also have a new online website launch in October. Thank you again and we hope you enjoy the rest of your time here in Coastal Alabama.

name: Stormy Rainbows
text: Amazing customer service- My twin two year old toddlers were acting 🤪🤪..The amazing gentlemen came over and let them pick some small black tourmaline for them to keep to help calm them! Then we had forgot our debit card and the nice woman at the desk wasn’t bothered at all in my son still acting a mess. Prices were FANTASTIC! They even have a small mining sluice. Will definitely be making this one of my go to crystal shops! Thank y’all so much for your patience and guidance.

name: Kennedy Grace
text: I loved it so much I was only in orange beach for a week and went to coastal zen 3 TIMES. I'm addicted. The staff was really friendly. and the prices are the best I've ever seen. And with them being online now too! they are the only place I'll ever get my spiritual needs.

name: Mariam Smith
text: My sister and I did a sand bucket panning, it was very amusing and we got a nice selection of rocks and shark teeth! Everything was really cute too, I ended up with some cool mushroom stickers myself ☺️

resp.text: Yeah! Thank you for the review, we appreciate you! So glad you two enjoyed the mining ⛏ have a wonderful weekend!

name: Allison Chapman
text: I will visit here every time we go to Gulf Shores or Orange beach!! I will have to shop in their online store until then! It was such a peaceful store. The owner was very courteous and helped us but he didn't hover over us like many shops will. We spent almost an hour shopping and everything was well worth its price! So glad we found this gem on our day trip I will be enjoying my goodies for a long time!

name: Shawn Mitchell
text: This was by far our favorite shop at The Wharf. We got lucky and were there when the owners were in the store. We were looking at the petrified wood and they ended up showing us so many more interesting pieces! They have this store because they love the stones and other items. Everything was reasonably priced and beautiful!

name: Sierota Beth Brackett
text: My experience at A Coastal Zen was fabulous! The owners are warm and welcoming. I felt very much at home as I browsed through their collection of healing crystals, ritual candles & incense, inspirational/motivational art, spiritual & meditation tools, and all sorts of unique trinkets and decorations. The store is filled with interesting products from across the world. There is something here for everyone! The owners even showed me a few of their prized personal possessions which were kept in the back room, making me feel like V.I.P.  The store itself was well kept...which I can only imagine to be a constant struggle considering how many shelves and items must be dusted frequently to maintain the clean environment. Everything sparkles! If you have the chance, ask the owner about the musical vibrations produced by the bronze gong hanging behind the register -- it makes beautiful sounds which fill the space entirely, engulfing it's visitors in a sense of peace and tranquility. This store is just the kind of retail attraction our community needs in this area - Definitely recommend visiting A Coastal Zen as soon as possible!!! Bring more money than you think you will need because you will be surprised how many items will strike your fancy! The owners are well educated in product knowledge and price the pieces very, very reasonably. It's a treasure trove of goodies!!!

resp.text: Thank you so very much for such a glowing review. We love our customers and so look forward to you visiting us again.

name: Ken
text: absolutely amazing the store keepers where very helpful and i got exactly what i needed 5 stares

name: Pansexual doom
text: I went to the warf on a vacation and stumbled apon this place, it is so cute and welcoming, the prices are super reasonable and the family that owns the place is so kind and helpful, if you are LGBTQ+ or wiccan/pagan/spiritual this place is a safe space and offers you things to show your pride or help your spiritual journey!!! I can't stress how much serotonin A Coastal Zen gives me!!!

resp.text: Awe… you made my night 💕🌈♥️ we appreciate the love and You!

name: Free Me
text:
My birthday just got better!

The kids and I came in for a little Crystal mining ⛏ and had a blast learning about different stones and their meanings. I definitely recommend Coastal Zen ! They have great prices and welcoming customer service 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩 don’t let no hater tell you different 👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽 That’s on period 🙃

name: Antoinette Hardy
text: I bought my custom made ring from here and I'm totally happy with it. Katherine helped me and she was very patient with me, as I am a very picky. She is very knowledgeable about diamond and will find you a diamond at a reasonable price.

resp.text:
Hi Antoinette

Thank you for a review but I think you may have us mistaken with another company. We do not sell diamond rings nor do we have anyone who works for us named Katherine.

We are a rock/crystal shop
In a orange Beach ❤️

Hope you have a great Holiday Season!

name: Michelle Murr
text: If you are looking for something and you're not sure what, this is THE PLACE FOR YOU!  Went with a friend in search of specific stones and spent a ridiculous amount of time in the store.  Amazing people and amazing products.  I left with bracelets for myself and friends, rocks for same, prayer candles and a great gift for a friend who is a healer.  A beautiful blessing awaits you, don't miss a chance to check this place out!!!!!!

name: Alexandra Co
text: Love this store! Nice ambiance, great selection and the staff is always so helpful, patient and knowledgeable.

name: Melodye Harleen
text: This place is a non-negotiable part of every trip up north for my brother and I. I generally love bookstores, especially intimate and down to earth bookstores with interesting selections. Loved this place even before I knew all the history it held.

name: kxlciii
text: best crystal shop <3

name: Don Cheek
text: Glad that we took the time to visit this store. Me and the wife found stones for us both. It was mind blowing how much information Stan gave us and in the decision that we made in our purchases. Will definitely return.

name: Suerianne Davis
text: The selection and quality in this store are amazing! The personal attention and the knowledge that Stan and his staff provide makes choosing the stones and jewelry and clusters really gratifying.  Moreover, Stan was willing to work with me to sell and mail an order when I could not travel to Alabama.  I look forward to returning when traveling is safe.  Such a wonderful experience to be at A Coastal Zen!

name: Lisa Hannah
text: I love this place!! I found it 3yrs ago on our annual trip to Gulf Shores from Missouri my trip is not complete without shopping here for my yearly supplies. They are so friendly and helpful!! Also they have descriptions and uses with each stone its so amazing!! Thank You!! Will see you again in March!!

name: Peyton Cole
text: Hey I told y’all I was coming back today but I didn’t keep my word I went on home but I really appreciate all the knowledge Stan blessed me and my family with. I also appreciate the sweet deal he gave me! Hopefully me and my family luck and energy will begin to turn around and be positive

resp.text: Thank you, Peyton!  So glad you enjoyed your visit with Stan and hope you come back to see us soon!

name: Kathy Humphres
text: Awesome place with so many cool things and very reasonable prices. I love to go there the owners are so friendly and helpful I could spend hours just checking everything out. If you’re ever in the area you should check them out.

resp.text: Thank you, Kathy!  So glad you enjoyed your visit and hope you come back soon!

name: Debbie Busby
text:
Very neat little shop! Beautiful crystals, stones salt lamps. Bracelets, earrings etc...
I was able to find all of my  souvenirs to take back home with me. While I was there they have this mining  thing for children to kinda of mine for their own shells or crystals‼️ Super Cute. Great Customer Service❤️

name: Glenda Zollicoffer-Harrel
text: I had such a wonderful experience there yesterday. The owner was so nice. I bought so many pieces, but not everything I wanted, she told they had an online store for using later. gave. She also have me some useful information on traveling back this way next time. I will definitely be shopping online with her.

resp.text: Thank you, Glenda!  We so appreciate you taking the time to write us such a glowing review!  Come back soon!

name: Tina Cozart
text: Beautiful store, friendly staff and great prices! 💯🥰✨

name: Susanna Forbes
text: Coastal Zen is wonderful, the staff is always very helpful, everything is crazy affordable and they have everything you need. Stan is very helpful and really knows what he's taking about. I always spend way more than I would want to there, but it's totally worth it ❤️

resp.text: Thank you, Susanna!  We have the best customers and love that you enjoy shopping with us as much as we appreciate you!

name: Brandy McGee
text: I’m a huge crystal hound and I was so excited to find this shop on my vacation here. The girl working was super sweet and very knowledgeable. I overheard her helping some ladies to pick out stones and she really knew her stuff. I found a lot a crystals that I didn’t have in my collection. Most expensive one was $3. I love this place!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Brandy!  We are so glad you found us and hope you make a repeat visit to our area soon!

name: PαԵԵí Aղժҽɾsօղ
text: Just from the reviews and photos of the shop I want to go visit! I'm a local and will certainly drop some dough on some crystals, tapestries, tarot?, and more😊 I CAN'T WAIT!! Thank you for opening a metaphysical shop in our area! ❤️

resp.text: Hi Patti 🙏 I finally figured out how to access these reviews and respond 😇 thank you so very much for the love and support❣️ let us know if we may assist you with any of your spiritual tool needs or if you just want a little pick me 😘 also send a text to the shop phone 251-752-3489 and let us know who you are and we will text you back a discount code to use in the shop or online 😍 Many blessings and much gratitude always 🙏💙😇 MK

name: Princess MeMe
text: We had a very welcoming experience. Staff/Owners were very friendly and helpful, not pushy, they were happy to help and answer questions. They made us feel like friends instead of customers. They had a great selection, I had a hard time choosing so I got a few items, We definitely recommend this awesome place. Thank you so much for all you've done for us. Be Blessed!

name: Denise Davies
text: Found this place during my yearly October orange beach visit with my husband. I wanted to find a real metaphysical shop, and this is a hidden little gem at the wharf. Whimsical, clean, and the staff was incredibly sweet. 10/10 will visit and give my business every time I visit.

resp.text: Hi Denise ❤️ thank you for your kind words and wonderful feedback! We truly appreciate all of our customers and we love hearing feedback! In a world full of rocks you are one of our favorite Gems 💎 😘✌️😍 many blessings to you and your loved ones always! MK

name: Sarah Wyckoff
text: This shop is wonderful, and there is nothing quite like it in our area! The selection is great, and the prices are very reasonable. The staff were so friendly and helpful. I will definitely make this a regular stop!

name: Brandy Knodel
text: My absolute favorite store ever. Love you all and thank you for walking with me down my crystal journey.

resp.text: Thank you, Brandy. We do enjoy our customers and love making their experience a fun one when they visit us. We hope you visit us often!

name: Cara Prentice
text: Loved this place! It was so nice to find a store that is so peaceful and inviting in a busy tourist area. Great selection of crystals, stones, jewlery & more. Owners are great and very knowledgeable. Make sure to ask them to show you what they know!

name: Lauralea Lasher
text: A wide variety of crystals and stones. Extremely reasonable pricing. Great selection on natural quartz crystals. As well as knowledgeable and friendly staff. I had to come back twice in a week for more!

resp.text: Thank you! We are so excited to be open and sharing our love of Crystals and things Love! We truly appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review! May you always be showered with Blessings!

name: Rachel Lavergne
text:
Absolutely love this place, I found a beautiful Mermaid light for a reasonable price and they were even nice enough to offer me a discount since I was from out of state. They have so much to offer, glad I stopped by!!!!

-Rachel

name: Lindsay Hoebing
text: What a wonderful establishment! There’s such a wide array of items available. The owner is very knowledgeable about everything in the store as well. I wish there were more stores like this!

name: patricia forrest
text: So grateful this shop is here now! Beautiful store with a great selection and incredible customer service. There's something for everyone here and the owners are extremely knowledgeable and so, so kind!! 💙🙏💚

name: dolly wallace
text: Outstanding customer service and were very knowledgeable about their inventory. Liked them so much I will buy from their online store until my next visit to Orange Beach.

name: Jeremy Thomas
text: Really cool stones, very nice!

name: Jill Esterly
text: I have gotten many massages over the years but this was absolutely the best massage I've ever gotten. Hailey listened to all my concerns and applied the amount of pressure I asked for. She focused on the areas I had mentioned were giving me issues. The ambiance was extremely calming, soothing, and relaxing. It was a great experience all around. I will definitely be coming back here.

resp.text: We're so happy to hear you had a great experience! We hope to see you back again soon :)

name: Brad G
text: Michelle is a caring massage therapist. She's been helping me with my usual aches/pains resulting from a desk job for years.

name: Leigh Cella
text:
I have had many massages over the years. My massage was unlike any massage I have ever received. IT WAS AMAZING! And that does not even come close to how I would describe my massage.

If you want to feel better contact Abiding Hands Therapy now. Even a day after I still feel the tranquility.

Thank you Abiding Hands, thank you
-Leigh

resp.text: Thank you so much for you review! It was such a pleasure to have you in, we are so glad you enjoyed your experience with us!

name: Ladonna Allen
text: WOW, what an amazing session I had with Hailee! I have had many, many massages but never one that addressed and relieved so many of my issues. Not only did I leave completely relaxed, but I no longer had a headache and could move my neck and hips without cringing. If you are in need of a therapist that knows how to listen to you and provide the best deep tissue massage ever, then Hailee is your person. I live an hour away but it is certainly worth the trip and can’t wait to return.

name: April Jossey
text: I had the most wonderful massage with Hailee today. I went in with back pain & came out feeling so much better. She was a great listener when I told about my problem areas and she was able to easily find them and successfully work them out. I was so pleased with the experience that I’ve already scheduled my next appointment!

name: Kami Pearson
text: Hailee did a wonderful job! Very convenient location and very relaxing room! Best massage I’ve EVER had! I will definitely be back and I highly recommend it!

name: Tristan Graham
text: I had been driving to Birmingham to receive Myofascial Release Therapy once a week until I was referred to Hailee, and let me tell you that she is INCREDIBLE! I can walk in and just tell her to “fix me” and I leave feeling so much better. She is very knowledgeable, kind and calming. I highly recommend her.

name: Vanita Turner
text: Michelle, thank you for an amazing and perfect massage. It was my first Ashiatsu but will not be the last, you have definitely mastered this technique. The ambience in your therapy room is beautiful and relaxing. I will definitely look forward to my next sessions on future visits to Huntsville.

name: Beth Heflin
text: Michelle is amazing! Best massage I've ever had in my life. She listens and follows through. I don't feel like I've been beaten up. I feel fresh and new and energized! I recommend you make an appointment right away!

name: Jennifer Morgan
text: Michelle gives the best massages! I never had a massage I enjoyed before going to her and now I am a regular customer. She will work just the spots I ask her to so I can get the exact relief and relaxation I need!

name: Fern Brazda
text: I had one of the best massages. I have back problems and my back felt great, I was relaxed in this most comfortable relaxing atmosphere. Feeling relaxed without pain was my main objective and I came home pain free and relaxed! I can’t wait to get another ashiatsu  massage!

name: Travis Nixon
text:
I've been seeing Michelle at Abiding Hands for a while now.  When I was playing soccer and dancing regularly my muscles would get really tight and sore.  Michelle worked with me and after a couple of sessions the pain stopped.

I've had massages at other places that hurt and I just figured "pain = tight muscles leaving the body."  But with Michelle, I was surprised at how much release I got with almost no discomfort at all.  I would definitely recommend you give them a visit.

name: james elliott
text: Michelle is absolutely amazing.  I went for a 75 minute ashiatsu and I wish it wouldn’t have ended.  I felt the best I have ever felt and it was an experience I wish everyone would experience.  I highly recommend it.  If you are on the fence then make the appointment and you will not regret it.

name: Rebecca Stephens
text: Michelle is an amazing massage therapist! She's very professional and knowledgeable and cares about her clients. Highly recommend!

name: Misty Ortiz
text: I have tried several types of massage from many different places over the years and this was one of the best! I saw Michelle for an Ashiatsu massage. The pressure was deep and it was very relaxing and therapeutic!!

name: Jalesia Semien
text: This was an amazing experience and Michelle has wonderful spirit!

name: Lauren Honeycutt
text: Michelle did an amazing job. I was so relaxed during and after the massage. I will be going to her from now on-highly recommend.

name: Mollie Garland
text: Michelle is a wonderful massage therapist!  She has always provided an overall relaxing experience. I highly recommend her!

name: Stacy Pierce
text: Michelle worked with me while I was pregnant. She gives great prenatal massages and is obviously committed to helping all her clients. I would highly recommend her!

name: Rachel Rushing
text: Hailee’s intuitive ability to locate and work areas to release tension is amazing! Hailee combines her knowledge of the body with a flow that relaxes you while healing.

name: Amy Goddard
text: Michelle is a true professional. She knows her field, she cares about her clients, and she provides a warm, enjoyable atmosphere for relaxation. Refreshing is the word best used to describe Michelle and a session with her.

name: Tanya McCune
text: I received a phenomenal massage with Michelle.   Very professional and a superbly relaxing experience

name: Sandy Tebben
text: Hailee is awesome! Very professional, friendly and caring

name: Stacey Hinson
text: Michelle is an amazing Reiki practioner. In all my sessions she has taken great care to guide me through my healing process. She is intuitive and takes time to help me understand everything that comes through. If you are seeking am awesome Reiki practioner look no further...book now you won't regret it!

name: Shelly Carr
text: I was very skeptical about going because of a bad experience a couple of years ago but in desperate need, so glad I went . Hailee was very professional and tended to my needs. I will be a repeat customer!!

name: Ashley Freeman
text: Everyone needs to go see Michele at Abiding Hands Therapy! She is a miracle worker! Wouldn’t go to any other massage therapist!

name: Paula Collins
text: Just had a massage today with Julee. Absolutely wonderful. It is my monthly wellness activity.

name: Sue James
text: LeAnne is great!  She’s very conscientious of your needs and works out all of the kinks.  She’s done a wonderful job dealing with all of the new sanitizing requirements.  I’ve been going for several years and will continue.

name: Macie Ussery
text: LeAnne does a fantastic job- I always see results after she works. I have been a client of hers for several years. During the recent pandemic, she has invested heavily in safety! She is using UV light to disinfect not to mention she wears and uses proper PPE. She offers packages as well. Best massage therapist of all the ones I have ever seen.

name: Kim Quarles
text: 100% worth the wait for reopening. Protective measures are in place and does not distract from relaxing. Enjoyed every minute. I've been going there for 5 years and Leanne is the best!

name: Char Tar
text: If you’re looking for the best massage ever, look no further than Peaceful Solutions!  LeAnne has the perfect touch to work out all the knots & kinks in my neck & back. I’ve been a client of hers for years & since the reopening, I tried the CBD isolate with my massage & I felt like a million bucks! I slept like a rock after the CBD massage & I always have trouble sleeping. The instruments she uses along with her “magic” hands are amazing!  LeAnne will not disappoint; book her once & you will be hooked!

name: Jeffrey Witcher
text: I am so grateful they are open once again.   I have missed my massage people.   I was very pleased to see and must admit very impressed with the measures they have taken to keep us safe in this trying time of covid-19.   They have thought of most everything from N-95 mask to hand sanitizer to ultra-violet lights, hands free soap and towels dispensers and increased cleaning between clients.   Thank you.

name: Sandy Morrison
text: Today was my first day back, after the pandemic. I've been seeing Leanne for three years, and was so very excited when Peaceful Solutions decided to open with step one, after the pandemic. This place is amazing, they have brought heppa filters, uv lighting, in which they wait an hour between each appointment so they can make sure each room is completely sanitary. Thank you Leanne for making me and others feel safe and secure while having our needs met. 💜

name: Brad Luce
text: I have been with PS for about 10 years. They offer services for all needs. During the Covid-19 crisis, you can feel completely safe with treatment. They have air purifiers in all rooms, hand sanitizer is everywhere, you have your own personal jar of massage cream, and both you and your massage therapist wear masks. Everything is sanitized during and between sessions. You won’t be disappointed—all of the ladies are great and you can specify who you want to see.

name: Elisabeth Newell
text: Pandemic, not a problem.  After careful and detailed research Peaceful Solutions has added many touchless products, like soap dispenser, paper towels, air purifiers in every room and sheets are covering everything.  I was not at all hesitant to have a massage in the pandemic, With LeAnne she eased all the uncertainties before I even came.  I have had her for over 5 years and she never ceases to be detailed and current with the times and especially proactive!!!  Thank you LeAnne, my body missed you!!

resp.text: Thank you Elisabeth! We have really put our time into making sure you can relax at Peaceful Solutions!

name: Jerry Lee Newell
text: Leanne is very good. Always feel relaxed and my muscles feel like putty after the session.

name: Jovonna Hardy
text: Very Peaceful! Heather is the best! She always delivers great service, very caring and professional and listens to her customers concerns. I recommend her!!

name: Paula Collins
text: Found this Jewel of a place with a Groupon but plan to return. Very nice atmosphere (wasn't certain when I first pulled up to the building) Awesome massage! Definitely recommend anyone to check it out.

name: David Brown
text: Good experience, it  took about 6 weeks to get appointment though, so be prepared to wait , my wife used a Groupon and  got it for 23$ after 50 percent off sale for father's day for me. Julee was wonderful, man I feel good, highly recommend. Thank you Julee

name: Carol Smith
text: I have been going to Peaceful Solutions for over 10 years.  The place is always clean, Trisha is ALWAYS professional and on time.  Love the new on-line scheduling, several times to choose from.  Would highly recommend Peaceful Solutions.

name: Jacqueline Cahill
text: LeeAnn is an amazing massage therapist. She listens to and meets your needs. You can schedule online or via text. Odd location and strip mall, but the massage is worth it.

name: dorothy thomas
text: Very good worth every cent down fall had to wait for someone to arrive to open business

name: Jessie Powell
text: LeAnne has been my massage therapist for some time. Besides giving an amazing massage, she has just made a ton of updates to make the experience as COVID safe as possible. I can't say enough good things about this place.

resp.text: Thank you Jessie, between the UVC lights, HEPA filters and hydrogen peroxide based cleaners we try hard!

name: Walter Overby
text: One of the best massages ever!

name: Ja'Nika Phipps
text: **DO NOT PURCHASE GROUPON**  My boyfriend purchased a groupon for services with LeAnne Owen back in May 2017.  I was going came in town to visit for a month after traveling for 3 months straight.  He thought this would be a good idea for me to relax.  When I received the groupon via email,  I called to schedule an appointment (as suggested on the voucher) but I just got the voicemail.  I called a few times over the next couple days because I actually wanted to talk to a person.  But after no response, I followed the instructions from the voicemail, which was to go online to check availability.  Only to find out that the next available day was in September 2017 (4 months later).  I immediately tried to call groupon to get a refund, because I definitely didn't want to wait 4 months for a massage.  However, Groupon was not able to refund me because it was day 4 since he purchased the Groupon.  They have a policy of a 3 day return.  They were not understanding and didn't care to hear my story.  I decided to try calling LeAnne again, but of course there was no answer.  I left numerous messages and she finally called my back 3 days later.  When she called, my intent was to explain my story to her and advise her I would be there for the next month to see if she could squeeze me in anytime within the next few weeks.  She said rudely said she couldn't and advise me to tell my boyfriend to give the groupon to someone else to use.  I made a suggestion to her to possibly disable her Groupon option until she's caught up, because I'm sure I am not the only potential long term customer with the issue.  She proceeded to rudely yell and tell me that she's backed up because of Mother's day and she doesn't need anyone telling her how to run her business.  Ironically this is the same place I purchased a Groupon for my boyfriend (with a different person) and he had a great experience.  Which is why he decided to do the same for me.  At the end of the day I will never give this place my money again and I will tell everyone I can the same.  My boyfriend basically, gave away money.

resp.text: I am sorry that this person feels this way. I do stay booked out anywhere from 10-14 weeks in general for new clients.  I called the person back as soon as she left a voicemail. I explained to her that if she calls and doesn't leave a voicemail that we don't know someone has called. The client wanted to know about how much money I make and I did tell her it was none of her business as it was also none of her business my relationship with Groupon which stands at 4.7 stars out of 5. I am sorry she feels this is rude, but I find it extremely rude for a stranger to try and tell me how to run my business. As a self employed person not having an opening 2-3 months out  means that I am employed, and that is a good thing. Groupon helps bring new clients in that I hope will become regular clients. I stay booked and I can't fit someone in because they are only going to be in town for a short time that just is what it is. That wouldn't be fair to all the people who wait the standard time for the great deal that Groupon is and I have done over 1500 Groupon massages in the last 3+ years. The person  begins the complaint by saying she was only going to be in town for a month and then talks about how she wouldn't be coming back. If she is only visiting for a short time it sounds like she wouldn't be coming back anyway. I find that most people who leave bad reviews it is because they couldn't bully their way into getting their way and try and get me breaking tmy best practices and rules. The fine print of the Groupn says by availability only. My schedule is online for the whole world to see. The lady wanted me to give her a refund and I told her no bc she didn't buy anything from me she bought a product from Groupon and I do not get all the money from the product. The woman then started asking how much I make  and that was when I told her it was none of her business which it wasn't. Being a therapist who is booked out means I am good at what I do. Groupon is to bring in new clients, not for your next day massage. I tried to help her and offer suggestions but she just wanted to be mad.

name: Johnathan Fail
text: Had a wonderful experience here!

name: Elle M
text:
If you value good customer service in addition to great massages, I would not recommend booking a massage with LeAnne. I bought a Groupon deal for two hour long massages. The first one was great but the second one never happened because LeAnne decided to "leave and go run errands" because I was 10 minutes late. Even though I called the business and left a message saying I was on my way, LeAnne informed me it is her normal practice to immediately leave the building and run errands if a client is not on time. She then told me I should have called her cell phone (which is not listed on the website or business door) instead of the business number.

I have never heard of such! If I have ever been late for a massage anywhere else, the therapist would simply subtract that time away from my appointment. I had taken off work to make this appointment, since this location doesn't offer hours that are convenient to people who work a 9-5 job. It's clear that customer service is not valued here so I will not spend my money at this place again.

resp.text: I wish to state that this client was a repeat client. She had been told upon her first visit to Peaceful Solutions that the office phone was just used to collect voicemails and given a business card with the cell phone number on it. The day in question I waited on the client for 20 minutes including calling the number given. The client did not show up. When a client is 20, not 10 minutes late it is my policy to consider them a no show. This was the second of a 2 massage Groupon deal, and the client states she got a great massage the first time. To give me 1 star because I upheld the company policy of not giving away free massages when people do not follow instructions is her prerogative, but she is the one missing out on great massages, and as for our hours of operation, I am a massage therapist of 20 years experience so no I don't work late or on the weekend, I work 9-5 like most working people because I too have a family to take care of.
